# T<sub>c</sub>1D notebooks

This directory contains a set of Jupyter notebooks to demonstrate various functions in T<sub>c</sub>1D.

## Notebooks overview

- [Get to know T<sub>c</sub>1D](explore_tc1d.ipynb) - Start here if you're a new user!
- [Kellett and Whipp, in prep.](kellett_whipp_tc1d_scenarios.ipynb) - Reproduce and modify figures from the article ...
